Short_Circuit.display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.display_target_help: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

Havoc_Punch.display_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.
Havoc_Punch.display_target_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Gale.display_target_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Snow_Storm.display_help: The chill from this Snow Storm has dramatically Slowed your attack and movement speed.
Snow_Storm.display_target_help: The chill from this Snow Storm has dramatically Slowed your attack and movement speed.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.
Lightning_Storm.display_target_help: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

Thunder_Clap.display_help: The Hero's Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.
Thunder_Clap.display_target_help: The Hero's Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Power_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Thrust.display_target_help: A powerful thrust from the Ballista that does smashing and energy damage and knocks you back.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Barrage.display_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Barrage.display_target_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Energy_Punch.display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Energy_Punch.display_target_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

Resistance.display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation
Resistance.display_target_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

Laser_Beam_Eyes.display_help: You can emit Laser Beams from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can reduce the target's Defense. You must have Conserve Power or Focused Accuracy before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Whirling_Hands.display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Whirling_Hands.display_target_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_target_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_attacker_hit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Flares.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.

Fire_Ball.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

Fire_Sword.display_help: The Legacy of Flame can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Combustion.display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

Scorch.display_help: The Hero's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.

Fire_Sword.display_help: The Hero can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

Fire_Breath.display_help: The Hero breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

Fire_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

Resistance.display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

Greater_Fire_Sword.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to create an enhanced Sword of Fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Greater Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Combustion.display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Sword_Slice.display_help: The Fire Sword has lowered your defense.

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Healing_Flames.display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments and to dramatically heal himself with Healing Flames. The power of the flames can also protect you from Disorientation for a while.

Combustion.display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

Fire_Sword_Slice.display_help: The Fire Sword has lowered your defense.

Crush.display_help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.
Crush.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.

Lift.display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Propel.display_help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!
Propel.display_target_help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Speed.display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.

Crushing_Field.display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Crushing_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Siphon_Power.display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

Singularity.display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Recharge: Very Long

Gravity_Distortion.display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Blast.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.

Ice_Blast.display_help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.

Fire_Sword.display_help: A summoned fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: A summoned fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

Frost_Breath.display_help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

Combustion.display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.
Combustion.display_target_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

Ice_Storm.display_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Force_Bolt.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolt.display_target_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Phantom_Army.display_help: You can fabricate 2 to 4 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long

Spectral_Terror.display_help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

Phantasm.display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long

Protection_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. Multiple Shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the shield can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: You have been encased in a Protection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)

Detention_Field.display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid his allies. The target can, however, use powers on himself. Recharge: Slow
Detention_Field.display_target_help: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Repulsion_Bomb.display_help: Projects an expanding Force Bubble around the caster that knocks down and Disorients nearby foes.
Repulsion_Bomb.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Knockback, Disorient

Storm_Kick.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.
Storm_Kick.display_target_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

Shurikens.display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.display_target_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Focused_Fighting.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Inner_Focus.display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Inner_Focus.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Crane_Kick.display_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!
Crane_Kick.display_target_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

Exploding_Shuriken.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate
Healing_Aura.display_target_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Fortitude.display_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
Fortitude.display_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
Fortitude.display_target_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
Fortitude.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception

Regeneration_Aura.display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Regeneration_Aura.display_target_help: The Regeneration Aura is improving your Healing Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Regeneration_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Hit Point Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.display_target_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Total_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Mental_Training.display_help: The Fortunata Mistress is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Subdue.display_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psychic_Wail.display_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.
Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented.
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate
Healing_Aura.display_target_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Regeneration_Aura.display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Regeneration_Aura.display_target_help: The Regeneration Aura is improving your Healing Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Regeneration_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Hit Point Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

Scramble_Thoughts.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving him dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Atomic_Blast.display_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Enervating__Field.display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_target_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -Recovery
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target, weakening their damage resistance and slowing their movement speed.
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has slowed your movement speed and weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while slowing their movement and weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your damage resistance and movement speed has been reduced.

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing and Energy damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. Multiple shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the Sonic Barrier can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.display_target_help: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.

Screech.display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Screech.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Liquefy.display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their Accuracy and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.display_target_help: The ground beneath you has been liquefied! You are stuck in sludge and taking minor damage. Your Accuracy, Defense and movement rates are reduced.

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Lunge.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Lunge.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Regeneration.display_help: You recover Health and Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.
Regeneration.display_target_help: You recover Health and Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Spine_Throwing.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Spine_Throwing.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Reconstruction.display_help: Heroes can concentrate for a few moments to heal themselves.
Reconstruction.display_target_help: Heroes can concentrate for a few moments to heal themselves.

Impale.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Impale.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Revive.display_help: Should a hero fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.
Revive.display_target_help: Should a hero fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.

Quills.display_help: While this power is active, you will constantly fire dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines do minor damage, but can poison all foes in close range. Spine poison Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Quills.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ripper.display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.
Ripper.display_target_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.
Punch.display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

Resistance.display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation
Resistance.display_target_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Haymaker.display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Haymaker.display_target_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_target_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_attacker_hit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
